title: Freaky Friday: Episode 22
description:
It Could Have Been Me - My "sliding doors" moment; Shadow Ghost, Husband, or Hatman? You decide!; That time I thought Pennywise kidnapped my son; My Parents Saw Bigfoot's Backside; Is there murder afoot? This mystery doesn't fall flat; and That One Time I was Punched in the Face by a Murderer.
